fields.summary: Windows Phone : Ability to create file inside Device Documents,Downloads,Photos or Music folder .
fields.environment:
O.S Windows 10
Emulator WIndows Phone 8.1
Titanium sdk 5.2.2
Appcelerator 4.5.0

comments.body:
Hello,

Thanks for creating the ticket. Our engineering team will look into it. This need to be cleared by our selection committee. Please understand that the processes is time-consuming and lots of variables in play. We will let you know if and when we will be including this feature in our platform.

Regards
